attributes.action: Stop transport companies charging students/apprentices full adult fares
attributes.background: People in full time education/ apprenticeships are being charged the same fare as an adult while only having a fraction of income! While most students are given discounts, people are still struggling to afford transport to and from their place of work/education. The government needs to step in.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The price of transport tickets is the responsibility of transport operating companies.

You could sign the petition below, which asks the Government to introduce public transport subsidies for students:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167435
